document_title: Shoulder bursitis: Causes, symptoms and treatment
subsection_content: Chronic and continuously recurring shoulder bursitis will increase the risk of damaging the bursa, over time affecting shoulder mobility.; Bacteria that cause inflammation can spread to other parts and organs in the body. Severe cases such as sepsis can be life-threatening.
subsection_title: viem bao hoat dich khop vai.json. Symptoms
subsection_data:
viem bao hoat dich khop vai.json. Symptoms
Chronic and continuously recurring shoulder bursitis will increase the risk of damaging the bursa, over time affecting shoulder mobility.; Bacteria that cause inflammation can spread to other parts and organs in the body. Severe cases such as sepsis can be life-threatening.
